reviewsJson.markdown:
**VAPE TRAIN BLUEBERRY JAM**

**DISCLAIMER: These are my personal notes that I am sharing with the community & all palates are different.**

**SETUP:** Tobhino RDA N80 3x28G 38G Alien 2.5mm 0.25 Ohms 45 Watts

**Testing Info:** Steeped 14 days, Tested freshly mixed and after 14 days Mixed @ 4% 70/30

**VT'S DESCRIPTION:** "sweet blue jam flavour that can be used in bakery, candy, fruit, dessert e-liquid recipes." 

**NOTES:** Tested on back of hand after mixing it tasted very blueberry candy like with some tartness. Aftertaste was like a blueberry powder candy like a pixie stick. After it steeped for 2 weeks I tried vaping it. It taste a lot like VT Strawberry Jam. Like a blueberry hard candy with a chewy center. I also really coats the tongue like the aforementioned VT Strawberry Jam. Has a thick and smooth mouthfeel. It is a decent enough blueberry that I could see using it in recipes. It is just not a authentic blueberry to me. It does have some jelly/jam like quailties in the mouthfeel. 

**Pairings:** This would go well in candy mixes, creams, other fruits.
reviewsJson.author: ebc88
reviewsJson.title: Blueberry Jam
